template.title: Office Space Construction Project
template.description: Complete construction of modern office space including electrical, plumbing, HVAC, flooring, and finishing work.

tasks.name: Project Planning & Permits
tasks.notes: Obtain building permits, finalize architectural plans, schedule inspections

tasks.name: Site Preparation
tasks.notes: Clear site, set up safety barriers, establish utilities access

tasks.name: Foundation & Structural Work
tasks.notes: Pour foundation, install steel framework, structural reinforcements

tasks.name: Electrical Rough-In
tasks.notes: Install electrical panels, run wiring, place outlet boxes

tasks.name: Plumbing Rough-In
tasks.notes: Install water supply lines, drainage, fixtures rough-in

tasks.name: HVAC Installation
tasks.notes: Install ductwork, HVAC units, ventilation systems

tasks.name: Drywall Installation
tasks.notes: Hang drywall, tape and mud joints, sand smooth

tasks.name: Flooring Installation
tasks.notes: Install carpet, hardwood, tile flooring throughout

tasks.name: Interior Painting
tasks.notes: Prime and paint all interior walls, ceilings, trim

tasks.name: Final Electrical & Plumbing
tasks.notes: Install fixtures, outlets, switches, final plumbing connections

tasks.name: Final Inspection & Cleanup
tasks.notes: Building inspection, punch list completion, final cleanup
